stPaginationLimit
directive in module stPagination

Description

Directive that displays a select element to change the number of items per page.

   <st-pagination-limit collection="users"></st-pagination-limit>

Configure the limits

The limit options can be configured. The default is [10, 20, 50].

   <st-pagination-limit collection="users" limits="[5,10,20,50,100]"></st-pagination-limit>

Usage

as element:
<st-pagination-limit
       collection="{Array}"
       [limits="{Array}"]>
</st-pagination-limit>

Parameters

ParamTypeDetails
collectionArray

Array that was initialized by the stPagination filter

limits
(optional)
Array

Limit options for the select element. (default: [10, 20, 50])

Example
